creator: otto.hirr@olabinc.com
text:
States under heading 'Building the full driver' to do:
make testall
./testall

However this fails because it has not made all components for test.
Should be something more like:
make check
which does the make and runs tests.
The 'make testall' does not include 'TESTALL_COMPONENTS' def'd in Makefile, resulting in some tests failing/hanging, etc.
It looks like this was fixed in r701392 a while back.  Thanks for the report.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
